BackstoryDef.title: Game Modder
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] off-time building quality of life mods for a popular computer colony survival game. [PAWN_possessive] story seemed to come to an end, but unknown parties intervened and preserved [PAWN_nameDef] for the future.

BackstoryDef.title: salvage survivor
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] and several of [PAWN_possessive] friends and brother attempted to secure material for crytpopods from a deorbiting derelict over their home world. But they found horrible monsters, only [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] brother escaped alive.

BackstoryDef.title: mechanic survivor
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] followed a lead on [PAWN_possessive] mother's dissipearance to a flight recorder on a trade station. [PAWN_pronoun] joined the station as a service engineer, there [PAWN_pronoun] encountered a cryptimorph infestation and only barely escaped alive.

BackstoryDef.title: archeological survivor
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was assigned to [PAWN_possessive] first mission for an archeological mission to a distant world, there were no other survivors.

BackstoryDef.title: glitterworld mercenary
BackstoryDef.description: Though glitterworlds are peaceful places, they often remain prepared for war. [PAWN_nameDef]'s original unit rarely saw any real action.\n\nSo [PAWN_pronoun] pursued [PAWN_possessive] work as an offworld mercenary, [PAWN_possessive] career has been a storied and extensive one since leaving the relative peace of [PAWN_possessive] homeworld.

BackstoryDef.title: phantasmagorical artist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] took [PAWN_possessive] nightmares and focused them into [PAWN_possessive] art, bringing the nightmares that had haunted [PAWN_possessive] childhood into visions which entranced and disturbed all who beheld [PAWN_possessive] work.
